comments:
Build 20020521 running on JDK 1.3.1
Target: JDK 1.4.1

It must be a timing issue as I cannot reproduce. All I was doing was to open a 
java editor in the runtime workbench when I got the following exceptions in the 
DOS console of the development workbench:

*** Bug 16991 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This can happen if we get a thread start event, but by the time we get around 
to creating the thread in our model, the thread is gone.

Fixed in JDIDebugTarget.createThread().

Please verify.
